Shopanova Email Marketing Strategist Job Description
We are seeking a highly skilled and strategic Email Strategist to join our team. As the Email
Strategist, you will report directly to the Email Team Lead and collaborate closely with them to
develop and implement effective email marketing strategies. Your role will be crucial in driving
our clients’ customer engagement, retention, and revenue growth through email campaigns.
You will be responsible for auditing prospective accounts, analyzing data, optimizing campaign
performance, and ensuring the successful execution of email initiatives. This position requires a
deep understanding of email marketing best practices, strong analytical abilities, and the ability
to think strategically.
Role Overview:
? Collaborate with the Email Team Lead to develop and execute email marketing
strategies aligned with client objectives and industry best practices.
? Conduct thorough analysis of audience segmentation and targeting to identify valuable
opportunities for campaign optimization and personalization.
? Write strong and persuasive sales copy and ensure proper messaging is met in email
campaigns.
? Work closely with the creative team to ensure effective design.
? Utilize email marketing platforms and tools to manage subscriber lists, segmentations,
A/B testing, and performance tracking.
? Monitor email campaign performance, analyze data, and make data-driven decisions to
optimize campaign performance, improve open rates, click-through rates, conversion
rates, and overall engagement.
? Stay up-to-date with industry trends, email marketing best practices, and emerging
technologies to drive innovation and stay ahead of the competition.
? Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including Brand Strategists, to ensure cohesive
messaging, branding, and alignment across all email efforts.
? Provide regular reports on email campaign performance to the Email Team Lead,
offering insights, recommendations, and actionable next steps.
? Continuously identify opportunities for improvement and implement strategies to
enhance the effectiveness of email marketing initiatives.
? Assist in training and mentoring teaUpgrade to see actual infombers, sharing best practices, and providing
guidance on email marketing strategies.
Requirements:
? Proven experience in marketing, communications, or a related field.
? Proven track record of managing and optimizing successful email marketing campaigns.
? Strong knowledge of email marketing platforms and tools, such as Klaviyo, Mailchimp,
Attentive, or similar.
? Proficient in utilizing segmentation and personalization strategies to drive customer
engagement and conversion.

? Solid understanding of e-commerce marketing principles and customer lifecycle
strategies.
? Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to interpret data and draw
actionable insights.
? Detail-oriented and highly organized, with the ability to manage multiple campaigns
simultaneously.
? Strong communication and presentation skills, with the ability to effectively convey
complex concepts.
? Self-motivated and results-driven, with a passion for staying ahead of industry trends
and driving continuous improvement in email marketing strategies.
? Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and adapt to evolving priorities.
? Experience in an agency or e-commerce environment is a plus.
As the Email Strategist, you will play a pivotal role in developing and executing email marketing
strategies that drive impactful results. Your expertise and strategic thinking will contribute to the
overall success of our clients’ email marketing initiatives, enhancing customer engagement,
retention, and revenue growth.
